mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOMEWORK.VOLUNTEER (MEMBER_NO, VOLUNTEER_NO, STATUS) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{volunteerNo}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT v.VOLUNTEER_NO, v.STATUS, vd.BOARD_NO, b.TITLE FROM VOLUNTEER v JOIN VOLUNTEER_DETAIL vd ON v.VOLUNTEER_NO = vd.VOLUNTEER_NO JOIN BOARD b ON vd.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO WHERE v.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY v.VOLUNTEER_NO DESC
